column1: Table 16.  Alaska - Race and Hispanic Origin:  1880 to 1990
(See text for sources, definitions, and explanations)  Two tables on this pages. Both tables have row headers in column A, the column headers are in rows 3 to 5 and 29 to 30.
(NA) Not available. 1/Hispanic origin based on Spanish language.
1/Censuses of population were taken in 1939 (instead of 1940) and in 1929 (instead of 1930).

2/The Mexican population in 1930 in the United States was reclassified as White in census publications in subsequent censuses.
    The Mexican population in 1929 in Alaska was not reclassified in census publications in subsequent censuses.
